title: Repeat While
description:
Following the same pattern as the previous problem. Add the two blocks to the while loop in the correct order so that the program outputs the following text.

0
1
2
The final value of count is 3
answer: The final value of count is 3
hint: In this program, the count variable starts at 0 so the output block should be placed first in the repeat while block. Then, the counter is incremented by one. Once the count variable has reached 3 or more the loop is exited and the next instruction after the end block is run.
